tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (2)  Hilarious (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: She is a really great professor that is very easy to get along with. The class was really easy and she explained everything in a way that was easy to understand. If you have any questions she is a very nice person and can help with any issue that you have. I would definitely recommend taking her class.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (2)  Hilarious (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Cancelled class all the time and never emailed to let us know.. Everyone would find out upon arrival to school. This didn\'t make since considering she lived three hours away so she would know a good while ahead of time if she wasn\'t going to be there.. Didn\'t really teach us apart from the book. Really just a nightmare class for me. Hated every second.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (2)  Hilarious (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Only taught from directly out of book. No need to go to class, you could teach yourself. Ask her a question and watch her squirm for real. Tests were longgg but fairly easy. Grading was fair. Was pretty but wore the weirdest stuff. Homework every class alot of it.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (2)  Hilarious (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: By far the best math teacher I have ever had. I would recommend everyone to take her class.
